display_name: Sleep Habits (SHHS2): Fall asleep while in a car
description: 19. What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep (not just "feel tired") in each of the following situations? (Check one box for each situation.  If you are never or rarely in the situation, please give your best guess for what would happen.)  h. In a car, while stopped for a few minutes in traffic.

hybrid.LABEL: SH 19h In car, stopped for traffic
